name: Featured Image on Edit.php
author: Fumito MIZUNO

sections.description: When you visit edit.php, you will see the list of posts. WordPress 3.0 has a nice feature called featured image, but not shown on edit.php. This plugin diplays featured images in the list of posts.
sections.installation: Copy the featured_image_on_edit.php into your plugin directoy, and activate it.
sections.faq:
I want to change the size of images

In version 1.0, the size of images is fixed to thumbnail(150×150). If you want to change it, find tha the_post_thumbnail(‘thumbnail’); in featured_image_on_edit.php and modify it.
